title: Today is Perfect : Uk Road Trip : Episode 1
description:
TODAY IS PERFECT UK ROAD TRIP -- EPISODE ONE

O'Neill are taking to the road this summer and if you haven't been involved with the 'Today Is Perfect' road trip already then this is something to tease you....

Join 'The Skipper' Scotty P and 'The Captain' Jimmy Boy for high-jinks on the winding roads of the South West coast, soaking up the ultimate in British surf lifestyle....

From crusing the crystal waves of Watergate Bay at the 'Ice Cream Surf' masters O'Neill Surf Masters' and sunset crowd-surfing at Electric Beach; through to intimate on-board seminars with photographer Christian McLeod, surfer Sam Lamiroy and O'Neill ambassador Ben Skinner -- the O'Neill Today Is Perfect Road Trip has it all.

The bus will be making a stop in Bude this weekend -- avoid that 'fear of missing out' and come see us at the swell...

Visit the O'Neill website and the Facebook to keep updated and make sure you don't miss a trick!

Take to the road and be at home with O'Neill.
TodayIsPerfect
